content: Would be nice to have a remind feature (or a bot that does it) where you could do /remind <duration> <subject> and get a notification after that duration is elapsed or at a particular time. Could be useful to track tasks and various meetings that happen here. (not a high priority but just a nice to have feature)
the community discord uses R. Danny for this (although it probably doesn't work with Zulip)
